p: The reducing power of the P. cubeba fruit’s essential oil was evaluated using the method described by Bakari et al. [ 9]. The sample was mixed with 2.5 mL of potassium phosphate buffer (0.2 M, pH 6.6) and 2.5 mL of potassium ferricyanide (1%). The mixture was incubated for 20 min at 50 °C in a water bath, and then 2.5 mL of trichloroacetic acid (10%) was added.
